title: [K-12] Practical Applications of Adaptive Control Based on Physical Information Neural Networks

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary engineering mathematics (calculus), foundational control theory concepts, and general understanding of neural networks
context.additional_context: Adaptive control system development combining physical models and data-driven learning, including analysis of real-world industrial applications

learning_goals: Learners can explain core components of physics-informed neural network (PINN)-based control systems
Adaptive control algorithms integrating data and physical laws can be implemented in simulation environments
Project deliverables applying PINN-based adaptive control techniques to real industrial problems can be submitted

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
